features.our_features_desc: Discover a world of comfort, safety and customization, for unforgettable adventures and hassle-free mobility solutions.
features.first_class_services_desc: Where luxury meets exceptional care, creating unforgettable moments and exceeding expectations.
features.road_assistance_desc: Reliable support when you need it most, to keep you moving with confidence and peace of mind.
features.quality_min_expense_desc: High quality at minimum costs for maximum value.
features.free_pickup_desc: Enjoy free pickup and drop-off, for a rental experience without worries.

about.title: About Us
about.offer_subtitle: We offer our clients a wide range of commercial and luxury cars for any occasion.
about.offer_complete: We offer customers a wide range of
about.offer: We offer customers a wide range of
about.description: At our car rental agency, we believe that everyone deserves the pleasure of driving a reliable and comfortable car, regardless of budget. We have created a diverse fleet of well-maintained cars, from elegant sedans to spacious SUVs, all at competitive prices. With our simplified rental process, you can quickly and conveniently reserve the car you want. Whether you need transportation for a business trip, family vacation, or simply want to enjoy a weekend, we offer flexible rental options to fit your schedule.

about.luxury_desc: We offer a meticulously curated collection of the most sought-after luxury vehicles on the market. Whether you prefer the sporty allure of a high-performance sports car, the sophistication of a sleek and luxurious sedan, or the versatility of a premium SUV, we have the perfect car to match your discerning taste.
about.comfort_desc: We prioritize your comfort and convenience throughout your journey. We understand that a comfortable ride can make a world of difference, whether you're embarking on a business trip or enjoying a leisurely vacation. That's why we offer a wide range of well-maintained, comfortable cars that cater to your specific needs.
about.prestige_desc: We understand that prestige goes beyond luxury. It's about making a statement, embracing sophistication, and indulging in the finer things in life. That's why we offer an exclusive selection of prestigious cars that exude elegance, style, and status.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read our terms and conditions carefully
terms.introduction: At PlusRent.md we want the rental process to be as simple and uncomplicated as possible. Everything is clear and transparent, without hidden clauses. If you have questions, our team is always ready to answer them.
terms.owner_desc: the company that provides the vehicle (PlusRent.md)
terms.client_desc: the person who rents the car
terms.contract_desc: the document signed between both parties
terms.guarantee_desc: amount blocked for the duration of the rental, which is returned at the end if contractual conditions are met
terms.id_document: Identity document or passport â€“ it is not mandatory to be issued in the Republic of Moldova
terms.age_flexibility: We do not have a strict age limit â€“ we discuss case by case.
terms.experience_evaluation: Driving experience is evaluated based on the client and the chosen car.
terms.flexibility: We are flexible and adapt to everyone's needs!
terms.guarantee_info: When picking up the car, a guarantee is paid, which is fully returned when returning the vehicle, provided that:
terms.guarantee_condition1: the car is returned without damage,
terms.guarantee_condition2: there are no deviations from the contract,
terms.guarantee_condition3: no fines, damages or shortages are found.
terms.dont_leave: Do not leave the scene of the accident.
terms.accident_insurance: If the accident was caused by another participant and the damages are covered by their RCA policy, your guarantee remains untouched, provided you have respected the contractual provisions.
terms.obligation1: drive legally and responsibly, without exceeding the limit of 130 km/h;
terms.obligation2: not use the vehicle for commercial activities (taxi, driving school, races, etc.);
terms.obligation3: not leave the territory of the Republic of Moldova without written agreement;
terms.obligation4: not transfer the car to other persons without our permission;
terms.obligation5: return the vehicle clean and in the same condition (except for normal wear);
terms.obligation6: take care of the vehicle as if it were their own.
terms.obligation7: to comply with the daily mileage limit.
terms.mileage_limit_desc: The standard limit is 200 km per day (24 hours). Additional kilometers are charged at 1.8 lei/km.
terms.mileage_limit_example: Example: If you rent for 10 days and drive 800 km in one day, and 200 km in the other 9 days, the total will be 2600 km. The allowed limit for 10 days is 2000 km (10 days Ã— 200 km). The difference of 600 km will be charged extra: 600 km Ã— 1.8 lei = 1080 lei.
terms.international_travel: Travel outside the Republic of Moldova
terms.international_info: If you want to travel with the car outside the country, PlusRent.md can offer you this option based on a personalized offer. Please contact us in advance for details.
terms.return_process: The delivery and return of the vehicle is done based on a report signed by both parties.
terms.refusal_situations: Situations in which we can refuse rental
terms.refusal_info: PlusRent.md reserves the right to refuse rental of a vehicle, without providing explanations, if there are serious reasons (e.g.: inappropriate behavior, reasonable suspicions, etc.).

sober_driver.title: Sober Driver Chisinau - Safe Transport 24/7

sober_driver.direct_call_desc: Call us directly for immediate assistance. Our professional drivers are ready to help you get home safely.
sober_driver.callback_desc: Leave your phone number and we will call you in a few minutes to arrange your transport.
sober_driver.why_choose: Why Choose Our Sober Driver Service?
sober_driver.safety_desc: Our drivers are professionally trained and licensed. Your safety is our priority.
sober_driver.availability_desc: Available non-stop, whenever you need us. No matter the hour or day.
sober_driver.comfort_desc: Travel in comfort with our well-maintained vehicles and professional service.
sober_driver.callback_success: You will be called in a few minutes.
